name: The Ghosts Among US
description:
For my game I wanted to create a frightening and creepy experience for the player. The player will play as Abella, a girl who is trapped in a forest surrounded by ghosts, looking for her heart. Abella must escape from all ghosts and reach her heart to win the game.

Tree in level 5 done by Nich Choo

Platforms, arrows, and water by:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/2d-basic-platformer-pack-110887

music by:

https://patrickdearteaga.com/horror-music/

http://www.orangefreesounds.com/creepy-doll-music-box/

All the other art is done by myself (Abbey Cole)
